select a.*, (select b.name from sys_organ b where b.id = a.parent_id) parentName, (SELECT c.label FROM sys_dict c WHERE c.[type]='1001' AND c.[value]=a.level_code) levelName, (SELECT c.label FROM sys_dict c WHERE c.[type]='1002' AND c.[value]=a.classification_code) classificationName from sys_organ a WHERE 1=1
and (a.name like '%'+#{organ.name}+'%' or a.short_name like '%'+#{organ.name}+'%' or a.simple_spelling like '%'+#{organ.name}+'%')
